scripts.postbuild: next build && rm -rf functions/.next functions/public && mkdir -p functions/.next functions/public && cp -a .next/. functions/.next/ && cp -a public/. functions/public/ && cp flutter-kanpur-website-firebase-adminsdk.json functions/ && (test -f functions/.next/prerender-manifest.json || echo '{"version":4,"routes":{},"dynamicRoutes":{},"notFoundRoutes":[],"preview":{"previewModeId":"development","previewModeSigningKey":"development","previewModeEncryptionKey":"development"}}' > functions/.next/prerender-manifest.json)
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only functions,hosting
